casebody.data:
Maurice McKINNON
v.
Judge Ernest FULLWOOD, Benjamin David, District Attorney. No. 680P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2006. Maurice McKinnon, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Benjamin David, District Attorney, for David. Ernest Fullwood, Superior Court Judge, for Fullwood.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 11th day of September 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, New Hanover County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in Conference this the 13th day of September 2006."
